docs.snippet: Betty Ford was the talk of Seventh Avenue yesterday, though hardly anybody saw her. But the word got out that she was visiting Albert Capraro, the young designer whom she had earlier invited to the White House, and everybody was gossiping about it...
docs.lead_paragraph: Betty Ford was the talk of Seventh Avenue yesterday, though hardly anybody saw her. But the word got out that she was visiting Albert Capraro, the young designer whom she had earlier invited to the White House, and everybody was gossiping about it.
docs.abstract: Mrs Ford and her daughter Susan, accompanied by Mrs Ford's personal asst Nancy Howe and Howe's daugher Lisa Courtney, shop for clothes at Albert Capraro's NYC store; dresses selected by Susan described; illus of Susan; of dress she bought (M)

headline.main: The First Lady and Her Daughter Shop for Prom Clothes

docs.snippet: The administrative restructuring of the city into 40 or 50 "service districts," each with its own police, sanitation, parks, health and other service units, was recommended  yesterday by the State Charter Revision Commission....
docs.lead_paragraph: The administrative restructuring of the city into 40 or 50 "service districts," each with its own police, sanitation, parks, health and other service units, was recommended yesterday by the State Charter Revision Commission.
docs.abstract: NYS Comm to rev NYC Charter recommends adm restructuring of city into 40 or 50 'service dists'; proposal is first of 20 recommended Charter revisions to be voted on in Nov election; comm chmn Sen Roy M Goodman urges plan's adoption to replace present 'unresponsive hodgepodge of randomly overlapping dists'; 7 of 12 comm members voted for decentralization concept, while other 5, led by Assemblyman Leonard P Stavisky, favor dist boundaries coinciding with 5 boros; comm vice chmn Edward N Costikyan questions whether Charter revision is necessary to accomplish redistricting; comm recommendations would: establish service dists of about 200,000 people each; designate mgr for each local agency; draw dist lines in consultation with Budget Bur and give Bd of Estimate power to change individual lines; Goodman comments on various aspects of plan (M)

headline.main: Charter Agency Proposes 'Service Districts' for City; SERVICE DISTRICTS IN CITY PROPOSED

docs.snippet: They're talking about bringing the Cannonball back.  The Cannonball is America's most unofficial road race --the rule-free, quasi-legal Cannonball Baker Sea-toShining-Sea Memorial Trophy Dash--with no prize money and little sleep as the "reward" f...
docs.lead_paragraph: They're talking about bringing the Cannonball back. The Cannonball is America's most unofficial road race --the rule-free, quasi-legal Cannonball Baker Sea-toShining-Sea Memorial Trophy Dash--with no prize money and little sleep as the "reward" for a grueling 36-to40-hour run on public highways from New York City to Redondo Beach, Calif.
docs.abstract: Barbara Stickford article on Cannonball Baker cross-country auto race from NY to Calif; race was canceled in '73 and '74 because of gasoline shortage but will be held in '75; cartoon (L)

headline.main: They Raced Without Rules From Sea to Shining Sea

docs.snippet: Nature occasionally imitates art at the bridge table. Once in a long while a hand with all the marks of a composed double-dummy problem appears, naturally dealt, at the table. When this happens, the odds are that the declarer will fail, and nobody...
docs.lead_paragraph: Nature occasionally imitates art at the bridge table. Once in a long while a hand with all the marks of a composed double-dummy problem appears, naturally dealt, at the table. When this happens, the odds are that the declarer will fail, and nobody will ever realize the full beauty of the deal.

docs.snippet: Of all the Sherlock Holmes books published or republished this season, "The Sherlock Holmes Scrapbook," edited by Peter Haining, with a foreword by Peter Cushing, is the most evocative and informative as to the legends surrounding the Great Detect...
docs.lead_paragraph: Of all the Sherlock Holmes books published or republished this season, "The Sherlock Holmes Scrapbook," edited by Peter Haining, with a foreword by Peter Cushing, is the most evocative and informative as to the legends surrounding the Great Detective's life. The Great Detective, according to Ronald A. Knox, was so altogether real that one might some day...
